title: Tree Plantation Drive
description: Join hands to make our campus greener by planting 200 new saplings around the entrance road.

title: Digital Literacy Workshop
description: A hands-on training session to teach basic computer skills to nearby village students.

title: Campus Clean-Up Challenge
description: A one-day event where students clean and beautify different zones of the campus.

title: Blood Donation Camp
description: A blood donation camp in collaboration with PSG Hospitals.

title: Coding for Kids Initiative
description: Teach basic coding concepts to school students from nearby government schools.

title: Senior Citizen Care Drive
location: Sree Ramakrishna Old Age Home, Coimbatore
description: A visit to spend quality time with senior citizens and distribute essential kits.

title: Road Safety Awareness Rally
location: Pollachi Main Road - SECE to Eachanari
description: A rally to promote road safety and helmet awareness among the public.

title: Health Checkup Camp
description: Free medical checkups for students and nearby residents including BP, sugar, and BMI tests.

title: Women Empowerment Talk
description: An inspiring session for women students on career growth, safety, and leadership.

title: Tech Support for NGOs
description: A technical volunteering event to help local NGOs with website and data management support.
